topic_title:
EC2 Network Interface
      Private IP Specification

variables.description: The private IP address of the network interface.
variables.name: PrivateIpAddress

variables.description: Sets the private IP address as the primary private address. You can set only                   one primary private IP address. If you don't specify a primary private IP address,                   Amazon EC2 automatically assigns a primary private IP address.
variables.name: Primary
